column2: Found at unmarked bandit camp just south of the Guardian Stones.
Found at Journeyman's Nook southeast of Winterhold.
Found at Riverside Shack west of Kynesgrove.
Found inside Redoran's Retreat northwest of Whiterun.
Found at Angi's Camp south of Falkreath.
Found on corpse on top of a mountain SE of Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon and west of Stonehill Bluff.
Found at Traitor's Post east of Windhelm.
Found on Dead Hunter southeast of Bleakcoast Cave east of Winterhold.
On Lucky Lorenz's corpse, across river from the Abandoned Prison, underneath rubble of house.
Found inside Stony Creek Cave far north of Shor's Stone.
Found on tower on top of Fort Neugrad southeast of Helgen.
Given to you by Velehk Sain.
